Mobiles.LongDescription: Perpetual isolation has not made Squints a very pleasant hobbit to deal with.
Mobiles.Description: Squint the hobbit is short and robust.  His isolation from the worldand sunlight has altered his appearance unpleasantly. Worn and tatteredclothing hangs losely about his pale and wrinkled skin.

Mobiles.LongDescription: `dA massive Oak Tree grows from the center of this room.``
Mobiles.Description: `dThe Oak Tree's presence is staggering.  His enormous trunk and limbsspan 100 feet in diameter.  His foliage is a dull yellow with signs of rot.His bark is a thick, dark-brown hardwood.  ``

Mobiles.LongDescription: The Lady of the Lake hovers above the water radiating light.
Mobiles.Description: `hThe shimmering avatar of `kSerenity `hhovers above the tranquil water.Her robe of gold glitters against the sun.  Flowing ribbons of `lblue `hand`owhite `hmove fluidly with the crisp wind.  Her beauty radiates all acrossthe pond.  She smiles and offers you sanctuary from your journey.

Mobiles.LongDescription: `lThe enchanted `oUnicorn`l is resting on her fleece.``
Mobiles.Description: The legendary unicorn was shaped from a horse.  The unicorn's coat iswhite, its hair short and bristly.  This animal has a horn in the middle ofits forehead that measures 15 inches.  The horn of a unicorn allows it tocast both attack and defense magics of limited diversity but greateffectiveness, in addition to its extremely effective use as a weapon.Legends have it that possesion of a unicorn horn will give the adventurerholding it the same combat abilities as the unicorn.  The mystical propertiesof the unicorn's horn makes it highly valuable.

Mobiles.LongDescription: `oA dancing sprite giggles and points at you when you enter the room.``
Mobiles.Description: The sprites are the physical manifestation of magic.  Sprites live frommoment to moment, from sensation to sensation.  Inherently shallow, theymust gratify their lust for sights, sounds, smells, and feelingsvicariously.  They are particulary fascinated by humans and spy on themcontinually, mimicking and imitating every nuance of human life.  They willoften try to entrap a human and lure him into their homes.

Mobiles.LongDescription: An ugly brute of a troll is here emitting nasty odors.
Mobiles.Description: This mean brute is horrendous.  He stand 7 feet tall and his limbs reachdown to his knees.  His dark, thick and dirty fur covers his entire body.His protruding forehead complements his equally grotesque fangs that droolwith saliva.

Mobiles.LongDescription: `oA flawless white horse is here, busily grazing on grass.``
Mobiles.Description: The beautiful white horse gazes back at you serenely.This beast doesn't have many enemies here on the peaceful plain.Oblivious to your presence, it continues grazing.

Mobiles.LongDescription: A weary adventurer looks as if he's been travelling for quite some time.
Mobiles.Description: This fit adventurer looks like he can take on any adversary.  His yearsof training has perfected his skills.  His adventures have brought him toUnicorn Point to search for a mythical unicorn.

Mobiles.LongDescription: `nThe regal Skandranon is here picking up some straws to complete its nest.``
Mobiles.Description: `oThis regal beast has half the body of an eagle and half of a lion.The `kSkandranon's `opowerful legs and swift beak and wings make him aworthy adversary.  When threatened, he will fiercely protect his young tothe death.

Mobiles.LongDescription: A bandit eyes your belongings and gazes at you mischieviously.
Mobiles.Description: This bandit stands up straight and quickly wraps his overcoat aroundhimself.  Carefully examining him, you notice several daggers sticking outof his coat.  He looks at you and grins.  Nervously, you wonder whathe could be thinking.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The baby gryphon is here trying to learn how to fly.
Mobiles.Description: This baby gryphon is a small replica of the Skandranon.  His feathershave not yet grown, and he looks almost humorous being so bald.White cotton-like fur covers his body.  If not for his dangerous pin-sharptalons and beak, he would be quite adorable and cuddly.

Mobiles.LongDescription: A rugged adventurer examines you closely and laughs uproariously.
Mobiles.Description: These ruffians were once good men, but the harsh weather conditions forced themto alter their instincts.  Their only aspiration is getting out of this dreadedplace.  In the meantime, they will take advantage of your company...

Mobiles.LongDescription: A brawny ex-mercenary, Swifthand polishes stands here polishing weapons til they shine.
Mobiles.Description: Swifthand, the beatup, seasoned warrior has retired from a life ofbattles and brawls.  Over the years, he has acquired many weapons from hisdefeated foes.  He walks you to a rack and shows you his prized weapons.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The water is home to some very mischievious water sprites.

Rooms.RoomDescription: Leaving the beauty of the land undisturbed, a gate of immense proportionsstands resolute.  Made of delicately carved, gleaming, translucent marble andquartz, the gate allows sunlight to pass through it to the ground below,providing perfect weather for the plant life underneath.  Finelyetched drawings of a unicorn scale the gates, allowing it both power andmystery.  Vaguely recalling fabled stories of unicorns, your attention isdrawn by sounds of howling winds bringing your focus to the north.  Throughthe collection of dust and wind, your blurred vision reveals a dimly littrail to the north.  Fighting back the tears from the dust, you see signs ofa scuffle to the east.  Senses of foreboding danger fill the air, tensingevery part of your body.

Scanning your surroundings, you see a makeshift camp that was recentlyraided.  Pots and pans are scattered everywhere.  You see a pit of fire thathas been recently put out, as you can still see the smoke from thetwigs.  To the north and east lies a forest.  You see large, menacingfootprints leading to the east.

Scanning your surroundings, you see a makeshift camp that was recentlyraided.  Pots and pans are scattered everywhere.  You see a pit of fire thathas been recently put out, as you can still see the smoke from thetwigs.  To the north and east lies a forest.  You see large, menacingfootprints leading to the east.

You are overwhelmed by the trees and wildlife surrounding you.  Rays oflight penetrate through the thick foliage.  Something is strange about thisforest.  Not able to pinpoint the source of your uneasiness, you shiver fromthe eerieness that envelops you.

You are overwhelmed by the trees and wildlife surrounding you.  Rays oflight penetrate through the thick foliage.  Something is strange about thisforest.  Not able to pinpoint the source of your uneasiness, you shiver fromthe eerieness that envelops you.

You are overwhelmed by the trees and wildlife surrounding you.  Rays oflight penetrate through the thick foliage.  Something is strange about thisforest.  Not able to pinpoint the source of your uneasiness, you shiver fromthe eerieness that envelops you.

You are overwhelmed by the trees and wildlife surrounding you.  Rays oflight penetrate through the thick foliage.  Something is strange about thisforest.  Not able to pinpoint the source of your uneasiness, you shiver fromthe eerieness that envelops you.

You are overwhelmed by the trees and wildlife surrounding you.  Rays oflight penetrate through the thick foliage.  Something is strange about thisforest.  Not able to pinpoint the source of your uneasiness, you shiver fromthe eerieness that envelops you.

You are overwhelmed by the trees and wildlife surrounding you.  Rays oflight penetrate through the thick foliage.  Something is strange about thisforest.  Not able to pinpoint the source of your uneasiness, you shiver fromthe eerieness that envelops you.

You are overwhelmed by the trees and wildlife surrounding you.  Rays oflight penetrate through the thick foliage.  Something is strange about thisforest.  Not able to pinpoint the source of your uneasiness, you shiver fromthe eerieness that envelops you.

You are overwhelmed by the trees and wildlife surrounding you.  Rays oflight penetrate through the thick foliage.  Something is strange about thisforest.  Not able to pinpoint the source of your uneasiness, you shiver fromthe eerieness that envelops you.

Ahhh...  You have finally made it through the forest to a small clearing.Grass and blooming flowers cover this plain.  This verdant area is home tomany species of wildlife.  To your north, east and south are more plains.To your west, lies the forest.

You stare out across the panorama and see nothing but green.  The plentifulsunlight is warm and the air is exhilarating.  Life here, most obviously,flourishes with wild abandon.  The plains are alive with sounds of chirpingbirds playing under the foliage of the trees.  Sounds of horses galloping canbe heard from the distance.

A beam of light leaks through the door and reveals a dark, gloomy cave.A horrible stench fills the air.  The odor seems to originate from thedarkest corner of the cave.  Behind the shadows, you see a small figure thatresembles a hobbit.  He squints his eyes as he steps into the light andtakes a good look at you.  The hobbit askes if you would like to buy sometrinkets and points to his collection of meaningless objects.

You stare out across the panorama and see nothing but green.  The plentifulsunlight is warm and the air is exhilarating.  Life here, most obviously,flourishes with wild abandon.  The plains are alive with sounds of chirpingbirds playing under the foliage of the trees.  Sounds of horses galloping canbe heard from the distance.

Rooms.RoomName: Beneath the Canopy of an Oak Tree
Rooms.RoomDescription: You hear thunderous sounds of roaring waters to the north.  You attemptto go north but an enormous oak tree blocks your path.  Studying the tree,you can see traces of what use to be a human.  You deduce that he must haveangered some powerful wizard as a human and been turned into an oak tree tolive his long life in agony.  The bitter oak tree stares at you withmalicious intentions.

You stare out across the panorama and see nothing but green.  The plentifulsunlight is warm and the air is exhilarating.  Life here, most obviously,flourishes with wild abandon.  The plains are alive with sounds of chirpingbirds playing under the foliage of the trees.  Sounds of horses galloping canbe heard from the distance.

You stare out across the panorama and see nothing but green.  The plentifulsunlight is warm and the air is exhilarating.  Life here, most obviously,flourishes with wild abandon.  The plains are alive with sounds of chirpingbirds playing under the foliage of the trees.  Sounds of horses galloping canbe heard from the distance.  You feel a cool breeze and hear sounds ofsplashing water to the north.

Rooms.RoomName: In the Shade of a Pond
Rooms.RoomDescription: A pond of water has settled here embracing the shade of a grove of trees.At the center of the pond you see a great weeping willow tree.  Even from thedistance you can tell that this tree is very old.  The sign of the willow'sage is apparent in its many-ringed bark and luxuriant leaves.  Dancing aroundthe tree are some lighthearted sprites.  These sprites have built a home inthe tree's enormous trunk.

The trek up this mountain trail was more than you bargained for.  Lookingover the side of this trail, you find a steep cliff.  A step closer to theedge and you will plummet to your death.  Cautiously placing each foot infront of the other, you progress slowly up the mountain.

You see a majestic waterfall running down a cliff and into a crystalclear lake.  The surrounding land is lush with plants.  Blooming wildroses and sunflowers color the area.  The fresh scent of the air andaroma of flowers rejuvenate you.

Drying yourself from the water, your eyes are suddenly drawn to amagnificent beast.  Lying on a bed of `kgolden `lfleece is the fabled`ounicorn.  `lSurrounding the `ounicorn `lare falling petals of `ired `land`owhite `lroses.  This enchanted vision entices your senses and sends yourimagination whirring into motion.

You see a messy camp.  To the left is a rack for weapons and armor.Careful inspection of the equipment reveals marks that show countless battlesetched into the surfaces of these armors and weapons.  The years ofbloodstains have seeped into the equipment, eroding the material.  To theright you see a fortified prison.  You can hear screams of torure, diseaseand hunger.  At the center of the camp there is a large pit of fire and a pot.There seems to be remains of human carcass in the pot.  Perhaps the deadbodies were past adventurers like yourself.

The dirt road continues here.  You suffer from the winds and dustblowing into your eyes.  Your throat hurts and your skin is dry.  Will youdie from dehydration?  Or will you be able to find a water hole?  There arethree paths before you, chose wisely and perhaps you may live to find...
You have succedded in finding more dirt.  You feel yourself growing wearierby the second.  Your hopes of finding salvation are dim.  The path to thenorth is blocked by a large boulder.
A dry dirt road is here.  You suffer from the winds and dust blowing intoyour eyes.  You wonder if the dusty trail will lead you anywhere but to moredirt.

`lACK! you have slipped and fallen down a sandtrapyou fall down...you fall down...you fall down...you fall down...you fall down...you fall down...`bThump! You hit the bottom hard and cannot regain your footing!``

Seeking protection from the sandstorms and hotwinds, a band ofadventurers have formed a temporary camp here behind the boulder.  Waitingfor better weather conditions, this group of adventurers is looking forsome fun to past the time.  To the east a refreshing pool awaits toquench your thirst.

`gJust when you were about to give up hope, you find the waterhole.  Thesparkling water was probably placed here through divine intervention.  Howelse could clear, refreshing water exist in a dry desert such as this?Should you stay here or go back east and take your chances with the desertagain?  Some travelers say that if you say `k"waterhole waterhole waterhole"`g a divine being may appear...  `
A dry dirt road is here.  You suffer from the winds and dust blowing intoyour eyes.  Mounds of dirt lay ahead of you.  You give up hope seeing thatthis path leads nowhere...

The trek up this mountain trail was more than you bargained for.  Lookingover the side of this trail, you find a steep cliff.  A step closer to theedge and you will plummet to your death.  Cautiously placing each foot infront of the other, you progress slowly up the mountain.

You have entered the cave of Swifthand.  Decorating the walls arenumerous trophy heads with a date indicating the time of death.  This isquite impressive and you think maybe the weapons here are worth testing out.

The trek up this mountain trail was more than you bargained for.  Lookingover the side of this trail, you find a steep cliff.  A step closer to theedge and you will plummet to your death.  Cautiously placing each foot infront of the other, you progress slowly up the mountain.
You feel relieved now that you have reached some level ground.  You seefew trees and abundant grass.  You catch a glimpse of several little rodentsdodging between the blades of tall grass.
Tall grass and trees surround you.  You can rest beneath the trunks ofa large tree in its shade.

Rooms.TpMsg: Increasing your experience by 450 points, you watch as the Skandranon builds a nest.
Rooms.RoomDescription: You have reached the apex of the mountain.  Straws of grass areeverywhere.  Ahead of you, you see a large male gryphon tending to his youngwhile his mate is foraging for food.  Inside the nest is a baby gryphon andseveral unhatched eggs.

You have entered a tent roughly created from twigs and leaves.  It sohappens that the tent is naturally hidden from view.  The dumb trolls can'tbuild anything more elaborate.  There is equipments stacked in thenorthern corner.  A couple of broken swords lay on the ground next to piecesof raw flesh.
A dry dirt road is here.  You suffer from the winds and dust blowing intoyour eyes.  You wonder if the dusty trail will lead you anywhere but to moredirt.
A dry dirt road is here.  You suffer from the winds and dust blowing intoyour eyes.  You wonder if the dusty trail will lead you anywhere but to moredirt.

You are overwhelmed by the trees and wildlife surrounding you.  Rays oflight penetrate through the thick foliage.  Something is strange about thisforest.  Not able to pinpoint the source of your uneasiness, you shiver fromthe eerieness that envelops you.

You stare out across the panorama and see nothing but green.  The plentifulsunlight is warm and the air is exhilarating.  Life here, most obviously,flourishes with wild abandon.  The plains are alive with sounds of chirpingbirds playing under the foliage of the trees.  Sounds of horses galloping canbe heard from the distance.

The plains are alive with sounds of chirpingbirds playing under the foliage of the trees.  Sounds of horses galloping canbe heard from the distance.

You feel relieved now that you have reached some level ground.  You seefew trees and abundant grass.  You catch a glimpse of several little rodentsdodging between the blades of tall grass.  Tall grass and trees surroundyou.  A large tree is here to provide some shade.

Objects.Name: key
Objects.LongDescription: A thin wooden key lays forgotten on the ground.

Objects.Name: post sign
Objects.LongDescription: `kA weather beaten hardwood post has been staked into the ground.``

Objects.Name: troll chest
Objects.LongDescription: A massive iron chest stands here, well protected against wind and time.

Objects.Name: dusty sword
Objects.LongDescription: A heavy metal sword, its once glossy edge covered with dust, lays here.

Objects.Name: troll gauntlets
Objects.LongDescription: A pair of troll's gauntlets sits here, enduring the harsh weather.

Objects.Name: troll helmet
Objects.LongDescription: A helmet made for the head of a troll glows with a dark aura.

Objects.Name: dirty scarf
Objects.LongDescription: A dirty scarf lays on the ground collecting dust.

Objects.Name: troll sleeves
Objects.LongDescription: Some blood stained troll sleeves are here.

Objects.Name: throwing dagger
Objects.LongDescription: A sharp throwing dagger is partially hidden here.

Objects.Name: Unicorn Point
Objects.LongDescription: `aA `oUnicorn Point`a is here hovering above the ground.``

Objects.Name: overcoat
Objects.LongDescription: An overcoat with many pockets is here blowing in the wind.

Objects.Name: heavy axe
Objects.LongDescription: A heavy axe waits here to decapitate someone.

Objects.Name: gryphon talons
Objects.LongDescription: A set of gryphon talons has been dropped here.

Objects.Name: dark bark
Objects.ShortDescription: the dark bark of a tree
Objects.LongDescription: Some dark bark shaved from a tree rests on the ground.

Objects.Name: oak branch
Objects.LongDescription: A thick heavy branch has fallen to the ground.

Objects.Name: crystal sword
Objects.LongDescription: `oA crystal sword traps and sparkles light.``

Objects.Name: enchanted stone rock
Objects.LongDescription: An enchanted rock floats in mid-air.

Objects.Name: oak ring
Objects.ShortDescription: a ring made of solid oak
Objects.LongDescription: An oak ring is spinning on the ground.

Objects.Name: gryphon egg
Objects.LongDescription: `gA glowing `kGryphon egg `gis radiating energy.

Objects.Name: serene necklace
Objects.LongDescription: A necklace, imprinted with the name `gSerenity`d lays here.``

Objects.Name: glass dagger
Objects.LongDescription: A sharp piece of glass shines brightly in the sun.

Objects.Name: ruby sword
Objects.LongDescription: `iA spectacular sword made of solid ruby lights up the room.``

Objects.Name: holy mace
Objects.LongDescription: `gA mace reflecting a deity's divinity shines with a holy aura.``

Objects.Name: devil bite
Objects.LongDescription: A dark malevolent force encases the metal object laying on the ground.

Objects.Name: peacekeeper
Objects.LongDescription: `lA wide blunt object lays here ready to do justice.``

Objects.Name: troll chest gold
Objects.LongDescription: `kGlittering gold sparkles before your eyes in an eye staggering display of wealth.``

Objects.Name: waterhole spring
Objects.LongDescription: `lA waterhole appears as a magnificent mirage in the middle of the desert.``

Objects.Name: China rug
Objects.LongDescription: `kA `iChina Rug `kis here for meditation.

Objects.Name: feather skandranon
Objects.LongDescription: `gA gleaming feather sparkles here.``

Objects.Name: holy boots light runicset
Objects.LongDescription: `kThese boots glow with a radiant holy light.``

Resets.comment: An enchanted stone to Squints the hobbit
A ring made of solid oak to Squints the hobbit
A gryphon's egg to Squints the hobbit
A fragile necklace to Squints the hobbit
A heavy iron chest at Inside a Tent
`la waterhole`` at A Refreshing Water Hole
A key to A nasty troll
`gthe feather of the`n skandranon`` to The skandranon
`kholy boots of light`` to The skandranon
